name.baseName: Tower production ; Tower of 1.25MW wind turbine (24)
铁塔生产 ; 24个1.25 MW 风轮机铁塔

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The 1.25 MW wind turbine towers manufactured in this industrial process are intended for use in wind farm systems for the generation of renewable energy. Specifically, these towers are part of a wind power system at a typical wind farm located in Yulin City, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China, which comprises 24 wind turbines. This wind power system is utilized to produce electricity with a focus on sustainability and environmental benefits, looking to minimize the carbon footprint and environmental impact associated with electricity generation.
本工业过程中生产的1.25 MW风轮机铁塔专门用于风力发电系统，以生成可再生能源。具体来说，这些铁塔是位于中国广西壮族自治区玉林市的典型风电场系统的一部分，该系统包括24台风力发电机。这个风力发电系统被用来生产电力，重点关注可持续性和环境效益，旨在最小化与发电相关的碳足迹和环境影响。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The generation of 1 kW h (kW h) of electricity is adapted as the functional unit in this study, and the corresponding amounts of CO2 emissions and air pollutants (SO2,NOX and PM10)perkWh of electricity are chosen as the indicators for environmental performances, and the monetary value (US$) of per kW h of electricity is chosen as the indicator for cost-effectiveness evaluation.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: In this study, the typical wind farm system in Yulin City of Guangxi of Zhuang Autonomous Region China was selected as a case study site. The developer, namely, China Huadian Corporation, is a state-owned enterprise and devotes to develop wind power by providing wind power equipment and related service in China [37].
本研究选取中国广西壮族自治区玉林市的典型风电场系统作为案例研究地点。开发商即中国华电股份有限公司，是一家国有企业，通过提供风力发电设备及相关服务，致力于在中国发展风力发电[ 37 ]。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The 1.25 MW wind turbine towers manufactured in this industrial process are intended for use in wind farm systems for the generation of renewable energy. Specifically, these towers are part of a wind power system at a typical wind farm located in Yulin City, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China, which comprises 24 wind turbines. This wind power system is utilized to produce electricity with a focus on sustainability and environmental benefits, looking to minimize the carbon footprint and environmental impact associated with electricity generation.
本工业过程中生产的1.25 MW风轮机铁塔专门用于风力发电系统，以生成可再生能源。具体来说，这些铁塔是位于中国广西壮族自治区玉林市的典型风电场系统的一部分，该系统包括24台风力发电机。这个风力发电系统被用来生产电力，重点关注可持续性和环境效益，旨在最小化与发电相关的碳足迹和环境影响。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: According to Introduced by the life cycle assessment approach [34,35], firstly the system boundaries boundary of wind energy as well as and thermal power are first identified. Then, methodology on evaluating both environmental and economic benefits is presented so that co-benefits can be quantified followed by the introduction of the methodologies on environmental as well as economic impacts evaluation from the co-benefits perspective.
根据引入的生命周期评价方法[ 34、35 ]，首先确定了风能和火力发电的系统边界。然后，提出了评价环境和经济效益的方法，以量化共同利益，并从共同利益的角度介绍了环境和经济影响评价的方法。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: This wind farm is equipped with 24 wind turbines, with a production capacity of 1.25 MW for each turbine, and t the operation life for each turbine is expected to be 20 years. The life cycle of one wind power system can be divided into five stages, including (1) production, (2) transportation and installation, (3) power generation, (4) maintenance, and (5) end-of-life recycling and disposal. The input of non-renewable energy has been shown in each stage. In this study, raw material, fossil fuel consumption and corresponding emissions have been taken into account of a life cycle process. Meanwhile, cost-effectiveness of a wind farm is considered because the cost plays a very important role in operating a wind farm [38]. Considering the data reliability and availability, the cost data of this wind farm was mainly extracted from a feasibility report of one wind farm (with a designed capacity of the 49.5 MW) in Kang ping County of Liaoning province [39].

该风电场装有24台风电机组，每台机组的生产能力为1.25 MW，预计每台机组的运行寿命为20年。风电系统的生命周期可分为5个阶段： (1)生产制造、 (2)运输和安装、 (3)发电、 (4)维护和 (5)报废回收和处置。不可再生能源的投入在各个阶段都有所体现。在这项研究中，原材料、化石燃料的消耗和相应的排放都考虑了一个生命周期过程。同时，考虑风电场的成本效益，因为成本在风电场运营中扮演着非常重要的角色[38]。考虑到数据的可靠性和可获得性，该风电场的成本数据主要取自辽宁省康平县某风电场(设计容量为49.5 MW)的可行性报告[39]
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset, researchers and engineers should consider the entire life cycle of the wind power system, including the production, transportation, installation, power generation, maintenance, and end-of-life recycling and disposal of the turbines. The non-renewable energy inputs across all stages of the system's life should be accounted for accordingly. For accurate modeling and assessment, it is important to include raw material and fossil fuel consumption, as well as associated emissions, in the life cycle process. Users should take into account the environmental and economic benefits for a complete evaluation, relying on established life cycle assessment methodologies and focusing on CO2, SO2, NOX, and PM10 emissions as environmental performance indicators and the monetary value of electricity generated as the cost-effectiveness indicator.

在使用此数据集时，研究人员和工程师应考虑风力发电系统的整个生命周期，包括风轮机的生产、运输、安装、发电、维护以及报废回收和处置。系统生命周期各阶段的非可再生能源投入应相应纳入考虑。为了准确建模和评估，重要的是要在生命周期过程中包括原材料和化石燃料消耗，以及相关排放。用户应当考虑环境和经济效益，以完成评估，依靠确定的生命周期评估方法，重点是将CO2、SO2、NOX和PM10排放作为环境绩效指标，以及以发电量的货币价值作为成本效益指标。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
